text: V354 Cephei is a red supergiant star that is 9,000 light years away from the Sun. It has a diameter that is between 690 and 1,520 times bigger than the Sun. This means it is among the largest known stars. It is in the constellation Cepheus. ==Related pages== * T Cephei * Mu Cephei * MY Cephei * RW Cephei * VV Cephei ==References== Category:Red giants Category:Variable stars Category:Supergiants
title: V354 Cephei
